description.$t: "Looking for a good-natured and happy boy to be your buddy? It just so happens that I'm looking for a good friend, too. My name is STANLEY, and I'm a friendly fella who's a joy to be around. Everyone at the shelter agrees that my good spirits make them feel better. I'm a seven-year-old pit bull mix with a face that inspires smiles, as well as ears that seem to have a mind of their own. I'm a good size, too, at 46 pounds. You'll be happy to know that I've already been house trained. I will be a loving family pet and a friend to all. If a family adopts me, the kids should be considerate and gentle. Won't you please come visit me and make my dreams of a loving home come true? I love people, so I know I'll warm your heart. I hope to see you soon. Love, Stanley"

Lovely TESSA is a two-year-old kitty who is affectionate and personable when she's in a calm environment. She'll need a fairly quiet home that doesn't have small kids in order to feel comfortable, and she'll probably need an owner who is adept at reading cat body language. Tessa is now enjoying some independence in one of our spacious Cat Shacks. She's the self-appointed house mother of a group of kittens, so she's feeling pretty special.
MISHA is an affectionate four-year-old gal who will be a loving family member. She's gentle, sweet, and just a little shy at first. Give her a minute and she'll be contentedly purring.

"Hola, amigos! My name is PANCHO, and I want to be your little buddy. I'm alert, athletic, and loving, so I'll be a great walking partner and a great snuggler. I'm about five years old, which is a great age. I'm over the puppy stuff, but still young enough to have a good time. I'm a cross between a Mexican Hairless and a Min Pin, so you won't have to worry about finding fur all over the house. A nice bonus! I get along well with other dogs, and I'd want to be in an adult home so that I can feel comfortable. I'm ready for a forever home where I'll be cherished, so please come get to know me and consider making me part of your family. Hey, don't be deterred if I bark at you from my kennel. I've come to think of my kennel as my little home that I need to keep secure. I promise that I'm a fun and loving fellow out in the yard. Love, Pancho"

"My name is FIONA, and I'm a lovely four-year-old pit bull gal who is on the smaller side. I appreciate attention, like a good neck rub, and I enjoy going on walkies. When there are no other dogs around, I'm fairly relaxed and easygoing. I know how to sit on command, and I'd love to learn whatever else you'd like to teach me. I'd be a loving addition to an adult home where I'm the only dog. I hope you'll come visit me and look into my beautiful warm eyes, then you'll see what a nice companion I can be for you. I'm waiting for you here at the El Cajon Animal Shelter, so please stop by soon. Love, Fiona"

"Howdy, folks! I'm PONGO, a good ol' boy with a heart o' gold. I love everyone, so I get along with all walks of people and dogs. I'm a nine-year-old American Bulldog mix who will want to hang out with you while you watch TV, do the laundry, or read a book. I aim to be your good buddy and faithful companion. In my new home, I shouldn't be relegated to the back yard, as I'll want to be part of the family. I've already been house trained, so that won't be a problem. As an older fella, my adoption fee is just $30, which is a real bargain for a sweet dog like me. I hope you'll want to visit with me very soon so we can sit a spell and get acquainted. I'm here at the El Cajon Animal Shelter, dreaming of my new home. Love, Pongo"

"I'm CORRIE, a lovable and affectionate Staffy mix who needs somebody to call my own.  I'm about six years old, which is a great age because it means I'll enjoy going on nice walks, but I'll also be content to be your football-watching buddy (or whatever you like to do when you relax). I miss human companionship, so I hope every day that a nice person or family will see what wonderful house dog I'd be. I like to hang out with other nice dogs, and I'd be a good pet in a family that has older kids. I've been house trained, and I will sit on command. Please look into your heart and consider making your loving friend and devoted companion. Love, Corrie"

"I'm SNOOKIE, an adorable, warm-hearted, and easygoing Staffy mix who needs somebody to love me. I'm about 10 years old, so I'd be the perfect dog to hang out with you while you watch TV, read a book, or do whatever. I'd also be thrilled to take a little walk each day, which would also help me regain my girlish figure. I love people, and I get along nicely with other dogs. I'm an all-around sweet and loving chub-chub. I've been house trained, I will sit on command, and I'm very obedient. Please look into your heart and consider making me your affectionate and loyal companion. I won't disappoint you. Also, my adoption fee is just $30: a bargain price for a wonderful dog. Love, Snookie"

Five-month-old ONYX used to hide in her kennel, scurrying away if someone tried to pet her. After moving her into one of our spacious Cat Shacks, she not only allows people to pet her, but she also purrs contentedly while stationed in one of the floating perches! If you're a kind-hearted and patient person who leads a quiet lifestyle, this little beauty may just be what you're looking for. No kids, please, as those young whipper snappers would probably frighten her. Please come see this little gal at the El Cajon Animal Shelter.

"Hello, friends. I'm JAXX, a good-natured and laid-back guy with a loving soul. I'm a two-year-old Staffy pit bull mix who aims to be somebody's good buddy. Everyone knows not to judge a book by its cover, so please remember that when you look at me. I'm a beefy boy with clipped ears, so some people might look at me and be intimidated, but the reality is that I'm as sweet as can be. The innocence in my eyes says it all. I'd like to have a home where I have a soft, comfy bed in the house, as I don't want to be simply relegated to the back yard. I want to be part of the family. I've already been house trained, so that shouldn't be a problem. I can sit on command, too. I'd need to be the only dog in my home, and if a family adopts me, the kids should be older. Please come visit me at the El Cajon Animal Shelter and find out just how wonderful I am. Love, Jaxx"

"I'm BETTY, a tiny cutie-pie who was brought to the shelter with my good friend, WILMA. We're both gentle, quiet, and loving snuggle bugs. We can be adopted separately, but since we've probably spent our whole lives together, we'd prefer to keep it that way. We're two peas in a pod. We're about ten years old, so the nice people at the shelter sent us in for professional dental cleanings. You can be sure that we'll have fresh breath when we cuddle with you. As older gals, our adoption fees are $30 each. We get along great with everyone, whether it's a person or another dog, so we'd fit in well at just about any home. Of course, if a family adopts one or both of us, the kids should be gentle and considerate. Please visit us at the El Cajon Animal Shelter so we can get acquainted. We'd love to start the new chapter of our lives as soon as possible. Love, Betty"

"I'm WILMA a small and delicate darling who was brought to the shelter with my good friend, BETTY. We're both gentle, quiet, and loving snuggle bugs. We can be adopted separately, but since we've probably spent our whole lives together, we'd prefer to keep it that way. We're two peas in a pod. We're about ten years old, so the nice people at the shelter sent us in for professional dental cleanings. You can be sure that we'll have fresh breath when we cuddle with you. As older gals, our adoption fees are $30 each. We get along great with everyone, whether it's a person or another dog, so we'd fit in well at just about any home. Of course, if a family adopts one or both of us, the kids should be gentle and considerate. Please visit us at the El Cajon Animal Shelter so we can get acquainted. We'd love to start  the new chapter of our lives as soon as possible. Love, Wilma"

"Hello, everyone! We are DAISY and LOLLIPOP, two cheerful cutie-pies who will surely bring happiness into your home. Our owner is no longer in a position to care for us, so now we're looking for a forever home where our delightful personalities will be appreciated. We're four-year-old ladies who can't imagine our lives without each other, so we'll need to be adopted together. It's a pretty good situation for you because you won't have to worry about leaving a lonely dog at home when you have to leave the house. We're built-in buddies! We've already been house trained, and we'd be fun family dogs. Please come visit us at the El Cajon Animal Shelter so you can see what a couple of all-around excellent pooches we are. Love, Daisy and Lollipop"

"Hello, everyone! We are DAISY and LOLLIPOP, two cheerful cutie-pies who will surely bring happiness into your home. Our owner is no longer in a position to care for us, so now we're looking for a forever home where our delightful personalities will be appreciated. We're four-year-old ladies who can't imagine our lives without each other, so we'll need to be adopted together. It's a pretty good situation for you because you won't have to worry about leaving a lonely dog at home when you have to leave the house. We're built-in buddies! We've already been house trained, and we'd be fun family dogs. Please come visit us at the El Cajon Animal Shelter so you can see what a couple of all-around excellent pooches we are. Love, Daisy and Lollipop"

Marvelous MILO is a one-year-old boy whose owner had to move away and couldn't take him along. Milo is friendly, affectionate, and laid-back, so he won't take long to adjust to his new home. Please come get to know Milo at the El Cajon Animal Shelter.

FRANNIE is a five-year-old beauty who's outgoing, affectionate, and curious. She's a kitty who adjusts easily to new situations, so she sought human attention from the moment she came to the shelter. Come spend some time with Frannie in our get-acquainted room here at the El Cajon Animal Shelter and see for yourself what an all-around good girl she is.

"Howdy! I'm SPARKY, a good-natured and intelligent pooch who longs to be somebody's good buddy. I'm a one-and-a-half-year-old terrier mix who enjoys going on walks, chasing after toys, and just hanging out. I've been quiet at the shelter, and the look on my face suggests that I'm always thinking things through. I'm thoughtful, curious, and very trainable. I already know how to sit on command, and I'd love to learn whatever else you'd like to teach me. I get along well with other dogs, and I'd do best in a home that has older kids if a family decides to adopt me. Won't you come visit me? I'm waiting for a loving person or family to call my own, so come meet me here at the El Cajon Animal Shelter soon. Love, Sparky"

"My name's BUTCH, and I'm one of the sweetest dogs around. I'm a one-year-old Rottweiler/ Golden Retriever mix who adores people. I'll give you a gentle lick on your hand to show you that I'm a special boy with a heart of gold. I'm good-natured and affectionate, so I'll be some lucky person's best friend. I love to play fetch, and I'll bring the toy right back to you without any fuss. I've already been house trained, and I'd love to learn whatever else you'd like to teach me. I'd be a wonderful family pet, as well. I get upset by other dogs, so I'd need to be the only dog in my home. If you'd love to have a loving and happy dog who'll put a smile on your face, come get to know me at the El Cajon Animal Shelter and consider making me your lifelong companion. Love, Butch"

"Hello! My name is MARY, and I'm a loving Lab/ Pit Bull mix gal who'd love to stay by your side through thick and thin. I'm about seven years old, which is a great age because I can go on nice walks but also chill out with you. I suppose you'd say that I'm reserved, so it has taken me a little while to adjust to shelter life. I feel pretty comfortable now, but it will still take me a minute to get to know a new person. If you give me a chance, I'll blossom into the happy girl I was always meant to be. I'd do well in a family where the kids are older, and I'm not particularly interested in playing with other dogs at this stage of my life, but I do get along well with other easygoing dogs. The shelter staff is fairly sure that I've already been house trained, but I may need a refresher course at my new home. Please come get to know me so you can discover what a sweet pooch I am. I hope to see you soon. Love, Mary"

If you're looking for a really sweet kitty who's loving with everyone, check out beautiful PENELOPE. She's a gentle two-year-old cat who is affectionate and attentive. Please visit her at the El Cajon Animal Shelter and make her your furry friend.
